import { ReactComponent as Close } from '../data/Close.svg' import Modal from 'react-modal' import Success from '../data/Success.png' import Fail from '../data/Cross.png' Modal.setAppElement('#root') type Props = { isOpen: boolean handleClose: () => void styles: any darkMode: boolean gameState: any state: any currentStreak: any longestStreak: any answer: any playAgain: any } export const EndGameModal = ({ isOpen, handleClose, styles, darkMode, gameState, state, currentStreak, longestStreak, answer, playAgain, }: Props) => { const PlayAgainButton = () => { return (
) } return (
{gameState === state.won && ( <>

Congrats!

Current streak: {currentStreak} {currentStreak > 4 && 'ğŸ”¥'}

Longest streak: {longestStreak}

)} {gameState === state.lost && ( <>

Oops!

The word was {answer}

Current streak: {currentStreak} {currentStreak > 4 && 'ğŸ”¥'}

Longest streak: {longestStreak}

)}
) }
